question: Show steak houses and sea food restaurants established in 1980.
sql_query1:
SELECT SteakHouses.name
FROM SteakHouses
WHERE SteakHouses.Year_of_establishment = 1980
UNION
SELECT SeaFoodRestaurants.name
FROM SeaFoodRestaurants
WHERE SeaFoodRestaurants.Year_of_establishment = 1980
sql_query2:
SELECT SteakHouses.name
FROM SteakHouses
UNION
SELECT SeaFoodRestaurants.name
FROM SeaFoodRestaurants
WHERE SeaFoodRestaurants.Year_of_establishment = 1980
interpretation1: Which steak houses were established in 1980 and which sea food restaurants were established in the same year.
interpretation2: Provide a list of all steak houses and also provide a list of sea food restaurants established in 1980.
